photoeffects: My Colors (My Colors Off, Vivid, Neutral, Sepia, Black & White, Positive Film, Lighter Skin Tone, Darker Skin Tone, Vivid Blue, Vivid Green, Vivid Red, Custom Color)
weight: Approx. 650 g (including battery and memory card)
brightness: Adjustable to one of five levels. Quick-bright LCD
afpointselection: Manual selection using FlexiZone AF/AE, Size (Normal, Small)
batteries: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery NB-10L (battery and charger supplied)
continuousshooting: ¹ Sustained continuous shooting function requires compatible SDHC/SDXC UHS Speed Class 1 memory card, total number of frames captured varies depending on shooting subject.
flash: ¹ Not all functions of the flash are supported.
afsystempoints: Face Detect, 1-point AF (any position, fixed to centre or Face Select and Track)
monitor: Vari-angle 7.5 cm (3.0”) PureColor II VA (TFT), Approx. 922,000 dots
drivemodes: Single, Auto Drive, Continuous, Continuous with AF, Self-Timer
imagemanipulation: Digital Photo Professional for RAW development
flashexposurecompensation: +/- 2 EV in 1/3 stop increments. Face Detection FE, Safety FE, Smart Flash Exposure
construction: 15 elements in 11 groups (1 double sided aspherical lens and 3 UD lenses)
gps: GPS via mobile (linked to a compatible smartphone)
stillimagetype: JPEG compression (Exif 2.3 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system and DPOF ver. 1.1 compliant), RAW, RAW+JPEG
closestfocusingdistance: 0 cm (W) from front of lens in Macro
externalflash: ¹ Not all functions of the flash are supported.
imagestabilisation: ¹ Values at maximum optical focal length. Cameras whose focal length exceeds 350 mm (35 mm equivalent) are measured at 350 mm.
canonprinters: Canon SELPHY Compact Photo Printers and Canon Inkjet Printers supporting PictBridge
computerother: ¹ Wi-Fi use may be restricted in certain countries or regions. Wi-Fi support varies by device and region.
manualpoweradjustment: ¹ Not all functions of the flash are supported.
modes: Smart Auto (58 scenes detected), Program AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual, Custom 1, Custom 2, Hybrid Auto, Creative Shot, Sports, SCN (Portrait, Smart Shutter (Smile, Wink Self-Timer, FaceSelf-Timer), Handheld Night Scene, Low Light (4.0MP), Snow, Fireworks), Creative Filters (High Dynamic Range, Fish-eye Effect, Miniature Effect, Toy Camera Effect, Soft Focus, Monochrome, Super Vivid, Poster Effect), Movie
type: SD, SDHC, SDXC (UHS Speed Class 1 compatible)
settings: Auto (including Face Detection WB), Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Custom 1,
meteringmodes: Evaluative (linked to Face Detection AF frame), Centre-weighted average, Spot (centre or linked to Face Detection AF or FlexiZone AF frame)
zoom: ¹ Depending on the image size selected.
movies: MP4 [Video: MPEG-4 AVC / H.264, Audio: MPEG-4 AAC-LC (stereo) recording level can be manually adjusted by user]

effectivepixels: ¹ Image processing may cause a decrease in the number of pixels.
